alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Burlington; Camden; Cape May; Cumberland; Gloucester; Ocean; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 12:25PM EDT until June 16 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Atlantic County in southern New Jersey... Cumberland County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Salem County in southern New Jersey... Northwestern Ocean County in southern New Jersey... Camden County in southern New Jersey... Gloucester County in southern New Jersey... Northwestern Cape May County in southern New Jersey... Central Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1224 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Woodbury to near Elmer to Greenwich, moving east at 40 mph. This storm has a history of producing quarter sized hail in northern Delaware. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Camden, Vineland, Millville, Bridgeton, Gloucester City, Cumberland, Cherry Hill, Evesham, Mount Laurel, Deptford, Voorhees, Medford, West Deptford, Glassboro, Lindenwold, Hammonton, Lumberton, Bellmawr, Woodbury and Pitman. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 2 and 4. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 19 and 39. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 1. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 11 and 44. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Burlington; Camden; Cape May; Cumberland; Gloucester; Ocean; Salem
